hero.title: Master Your English
hero.description: Join our expert-led courses and unlock your potential with personalized learning paths

about.description: Founded by Mansour, a dedicated entrepreneur, ENGLISEASY ByMansour addresses the growing need for accessible, high-quality English education. What started as a passion project has evolved into a comprehensive online learning platform, offering evening and weekend courses to students worldwide. Join us to improve your English skills in a flexible and supportive environment!

studentSpace.title: Student Safe Space
studentSpace.passwordRequirements: Must be at least 8 characters with 1 uppercase letter
